artifacts.summary: Dependency analysis showing proposed archival would break completeness proofs; recommends documentation-only approach

partial_progress.details: Research complete; found critical flaw in implementation plan - proposed archival breaks build

findings.critical_issue: Files marked for archival are directly imported by WeakCompleteness.lean and InfinitaryStrongCompleteness.lean
findings.archival_risk: CRITICAL - would break build if archived
findings.recommendation: Skip Phase 3 (archival), proceed with documentation updates only
